title: No Daughter of Luck Shall Be Spared!
author: Wuhu Takes Flight 11
synopsis: Xiao Fan transmigrated into a cultivation novel as a villainâ€”the Holy Son of Supreme Mystery Holy Land with tremendous backing and power. The original host was obsessed with various 'daughters of luck' and ended up becoming a stepping stone for the protagonists. But Xiao Fan has a system that rewards him for manipulating these heroines, turning tables on the so-called children of destiny. With his masterful 'CPU technique' (manipulation skills), he'll make every daughter of luck fall for him while their protagonists watch helplessly.
